mapper.sql: user.id, user.account, user.password, user.name, user.email, user.statue, user.remark, user.phone_number, user.creat_datatime, user.last_ip, user.last_datatime, user.area, user.user_type, user.cominfo_id, user.gmt_create, user.gmt_modified
mapper.select: select u.id,u.account,u.password,u.name,u.email,u.statue,u.remark,u.phone_number,u.area,u.user_type,u.cominfo_id,ci.com_name "comName" from user u inner join cominfo ci on u.cominfo_id = ci.id where u.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
from user JOIN user_role ON user.`id` = user_role.`user_id` where user.account = #{userName,jdbcType=BIGINT} and user_role.`is_used` = 0
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, account, password, name, email, statue, remark, phone_number, creat_datatime, last_ip, last_datatime, area, user_type, cominfo_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatDatatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastDatatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cominfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update user
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
statue = #{statue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user set account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, statue = #{statue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creat_datatime = #{creatDatatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_ip = #{lastIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_datatime = #{lastDatatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cominfo_id = #{cominfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select u.id,u.account,u.name,u.statue,ci.com_name,r.name "roleName" from ((user u inner join cominfo ci on u.cominfo_id = ci.id)inner join user_role ur on u.cominfo_id = ur.id) inner join role r on ur.role_id = r.id where 1 = 1
and statue = "已删除"
and statue != "已删除"
and u.account like concat('%',#{obj.accountName},'%')
and u.name like concat('%',#{obj.name},'%')
and ci.com_name like concat('%',#{obj.comName},'%')
and r.name = #{obj.roleName}
and u.statue = "正常"
and u.statue = "禁用"
mapper.update: update user inner join user_role on user.id = user_role.user_id set user.statue="已删除", user_role.is_used = 1 where user.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where account = #{name}
mapper.update: update user inner join user_role on user.id = user_role.user_id set user.statue="正常", user_role.is_used=0 where user.id = #{id}
update user inner join user_role on user.id = user_role.user_id set user_role.is_used=1 where user.id = #{id}
